item.title: PIMCO: Trump May Reshape Fed Outlook Through Personnel Appointments
item.description: On July 23rd, Tiffany Wilding, an economist at Pacific Investment Management Company (PIMCO), pointed out in a report that although U.S. President Trump may continue to criticize the Federal Reserve in the short term and call for rate cuts, he will not replace the current Chairman Powell. Instead, Trump will influence Fed decisions through upcoming appointments. For example, the term of Governor Quarles will expire in January and the Chairmanship of Powell will expire in May. It is worth noting that Powell's term as governor will continue until January 2028. Wilding emphasized that regardless of who Trump nominates to succeed as chairman, the new leader must put forward a convincing monetary policy stance. Firstly, they need to obtain Senate approval and then seek majority support from the Federal Open Market Committee. (FXStreet)

item.title: If Ethereum falls below $3600, the cumulative long liquidation on major CEXs will reach $1.79 billion.
item.description: On July 23rd, according to Coinglass data, if Ethereum drops below $3600, the cumulative liquidation intensity of mainstream CEXs in terms of long positions will reach $1.79 billion.Conversely, if Ethereum surges above $3800, the cumulative liquidation intensity of mainstream CEXs in terms of short positions will reach $1.186 billion.BlockBeats Notes: The liquidation chart does not display the exact number of contracts to be liquidated or the precise value of the contracts being liquidated. The bars on the liquidation chart actually represent the significance of each liquidation cluster in relation to neighboring liquidation clusters, that is, the intensity.Therefore, the liquidation chart shows to what extent the price of the underlying asset will be influenced when it reaches a certain level. A higher "liquidation bar" indicates that once the price reaches that level, it will generate a stronger reaction due to a liquidity avalanche.

item.title: PancakeSwap Infinity is now live on the Binance Smart Chain.
item.description: July 23rd. According to official channels, PancakeSwap Infinity (formerly v4) has gone live on the Base Network and comes with the following features:1. It offers dual pool types that are suitable for different liquidity preferences.2. It supports customizable dynamic fees through smart contract "Hooks".3. It employs gas-saving technology to reduce fees.4. The code is open source.

item.title: LookOnChain: Ethereum Drops Below $3700
item.description: On July 23rd, according to HTX market data, the price of Ethereum has fallen below $3,700 and is currently trading at $3,698, with a 24-hour percentage change of -0.42%.

item.title: Bank of England Considers Abandoning Digital Pound Plan
item.description: On July 23rd, as per Bloomberg, the Bank of England is giving thought to giving up its Central Bank Digital Currency (CBDC) initiatives. The Bank Governor, Andrew Bailey, declared that if commercial bank payment innovations achieve success, he would require "a significant amount of persuasion" to introduce digital pounds, signifying a global downturn in the support for government-backed digital currencies.

item.title: Binance will list PENGU/USDC, CVX/USDT, and SLP/USDT perpetual contracts
item.description: On July 23rd, according to an official announcement, the Binance Futures platform will launch perpetual contracts at the following times:At 15:30 (UTC+8) on July 23rd: The PENGUUSDC perpetual contract, with a maximum leverage of up to 75 times;At 19:30 (UTC+8) on July 23rd: The CVXUSDT perpetual contract, with a maximum leverage of up to 75 times;At 19:45 (UTC+8) on July 23rd: The SLPUSDT perpetual contract, with a maximum leverage of up to 75 times.

item.title: Bitunix Analyst: Trump Intensifies Trade Deal Push, BTC Altcoins Surge, BTC Faces Resistance at $120,000, Support at $116,300
item.description: On July 23rd, U.S. President Trump announced a landmark agreement with Japan. Under this agreement, Japan will invest $550 billion and make significant market openings. The U.S. is set to receive 90% of the profits, and it is reported that the automotive tariff will be reduced to 15%. On the same day, Trump also announced trade agreements with the Philippines and Indonesia, enabling the U.S. to impose a 19% tariff. Coupled with the 50% copper tariff that is scheduled to come into effect on August 1st, the global trade landscape is undergoing rapid changes. Traders are accelerating the shipment of goods, and market risk aversion is on the rise.Bitunix Analyst's Suggestion: Regarding the crypto market, recent news has introduced uncertainties, causing funds to focus on short-term operations. Although BTC has remained above the $116,000 support level, it has been unable to effectively break through the $120,000 range, indicating a clear consolidation pattern. Investors are advised to ad

item.title: Binance Alpha will list Alliance Games (COA) today at 5:00 PM, with an airdrop threshold of 200 points.
item.description: On July 23rd, as per an official announcement, Binance Alpha is scheduled to list Alliance Games (COA) at 17:00 today. Users who possess at least 200 Alpha Points will be eligible to receive an airdrop of 1,500 COA tokens on a first-come, first-served basis. In case the reward is not completely distributed, the points threshold will automatically decrease by 10 points every hour.

item.title: Goldman Sachs: Expects Trump Administration's Base Tariff Rate to Increase to 15%
item.description: On July 23rd, David Mericle, the chief US economist at Goldman Sachs, anticipates that the US base "parity" tariff rate will be raised from 10% to 15%, with copper and key mineral tariffs reaching 50%. This move is likely to intensify inflationary pressures and dampen economic growth. In order to reflect the new tariff assumptions and incorporate the "preliminary view" of the impact of import tariffs, Goldman Sachs has simultaneously adjusted its forecasts for US inflation and GDP growth. Goldman Sachs has reduced its 2025 core inflation forecast from 3.4% to 3.3%, raised its 2026 forecast from 2.6% to 2.7%, and raised its 2027 forecast from 2.0% to 2.4%.Mericle stated that the tariffs are expected to push up core prices by 1.7% cumulatively over 2-3 years. He added that the tariffs will reduce this year's GDP growth rate by 1 percentage point, by 0.4 percentage point in 2026, and by 0.3 percentage point in 2027. As a result, Goldman Sachs has downgraded its 2025 GDP growth forecast

item.title: Currently, there are over 35.67 million ETH staked, totaling approximately $132.5 billion.
item.description: On July 23rd, based on the data from validatorqueue.com, there are currently more than 35.67 million ETH staked, with a value of approximately $132.5 billion, accounting for 29.5% of Ethereum's circulating supply.A chart indicates that although the recent amount of ETH staking has decreased slightly, it still remains at a historically high level.
